price: 40. „Mano Viešpatie, padaryk mane atliekančiu As-Salat (ikamat as salat) ir (taip pat) iš mano palikuonių tarpo, mūsų Viešpatie! Ir priimk mano maldavimus.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
